 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְשִׁין‎</span>] **noun feminine plural** ==wives== (so Zinjirli ([[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>62.8</sup>) construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נשי‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְשִׁין‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשִׁים‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> on singular see Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִשָּׁה‎</span>, and add Aramaic of Nineveh construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אשת‎</span> ([[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>i.15</sup>), and Egyptian Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אנתה‎</span> [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap. D10</sup>+); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְשֵֹׁיהוֺן‎</span> [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]].
